edges(?reorient : Bool) : Array<Array<flash.geom.Point>>

parameters:
reorient If true, vertices in edges are ordered.
returns:
Array of vertice pairs.
Returns array of edges.

hitTest(point : flash.geom.Point, ?includeVertices : Bool) : Bool

parameters:
point Point to test.
includeVertices if false, vertices are not considered to be inside.
returns:
True if point is inside.
Tests if point is inside or not. At first, I thought this will be needed for tesselation, so here you have it :)

triangles() : Array<Polygon2D>

returns:
Array of Polygon2D objects.
Simple polygon tesselator.

This handles both concave and convex non-selfintersecting polygons.
